body.name: JUNNAI White Geometric Ceramic Lamp: 25" Tall Nightstand Lamps with Drum Lamp Shade | 3-Way Dimmable Modern Bedside Lamp End Table Lamp | White Lamp for Bedrooms Living Room (Bulb Included)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 11 hrs 51 mins
features: Contemporary & Minimalist Design: JUNNAI rhombus-shaped table lamps will elevate the atmosphere of your space, expertly crafted to complement any decor style. Perfect for adorning your nightstand or end table, this ceramic lamp will bring a touch of elegance to your bedroom or living room. (Note: The KD lampshade needs to be assembled.)

Sturdy Ceramic Lamp Base: standing 25" high with a 5" wide base, the entire beside lamp body is thick and stable, minimizing the risk of being knocked over. The non-slip pad on the bottom further enhances its stability.

3-Way Dimmable Design: there is a rotary on/off switch on the bulb base of the white ceramic lamp, every clockwise rotation of the switch to turn it on and off, the brightness will change once (Low-Off-Medium-Off-High).

Includes LED Bulb: our white bedside lamp comes with an E26 bulb, saving you the hassle of finding compatible bulbs. The 3000K 6W LED bulb emits a stable, soft warm light and has a lifespan of over 25,000 hours. It offers flicker-free, glare-free, and smooth lighting, making it suitable for reading, work, and study, effectively protecting your eyes.

Purchase Protection: the ceramic bedside lamp is backed by a 2-Year Warranty. For any inquiries about this bedroom ceramic lamp, please don't hesitate to reach out to us via the Amazon message box at your convenience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Terrific Transitional Look at Home with Any Décor – Included Bulb is Flicker Free
reviews.reviewText: The Junnai Navy Blue Table Lamp is a five star winner. It looks right at home with the traditional décor in our living room. It will also fit nicely in our our modern bedroom. It is as well made as it is attractive. The included bulb does not flicker in any of the three dimming levels. My wife and I love it.Speaking of dimming, it is 3-way, but not the old style that requires a costly and hard to find 3-way bulb; you can use any normal bulb in it as long it is dimmable. If you plug this into a wall outlet that is switchable know that if it is switched off at the wall when the light is on that it will come back on with the wall switch, but always at the lowest dimmer level.It took literally five minutes to put together; including unrolling and fitting the shade material into its frame. You will see a shadow line where the shade material overlaps at it Velcro seam, which is to be expected with this type of lamp.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Impressive Bedside Lamp
reviews.reviewText: I am very impressed with the appearance and quality of this lamp. The beveled design of the blue ceramic is timeless and the optic white shade is the perfect complement for the base. Most of the lamps I've purchased in the past within this price range came with a very cheap looking shade, but this one has a textured grain look and is banded top and bottom. I think this shade is lovely and I will definitely not need to replace it. The lamp itself is the ideal height for a bedside lamp and I appreciate the dimmable capability that allows me to use it on the lowest lighting level in early evening or adjust it to full brightness for reading at night. The lamp was delivered to me a day after I placed the order, it was well-packed and had no damage and setup took less than a minute since the bulb was included. I think this lamp is a "find."

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have this lamp sitting on a credenza in my home office to provide some accent lighting. The navy blue base is unique looking and very attractive. The base is heavy enough that this won't tip over easily. From the table top to the top of the shade, it is about 25" tall. It includes a built in dimmer that works like an old school 3-way dimmer, but this works with any type of E26 base lightbulb. It comes with a 60 watt incandescent equivalent 3,000K light bulb but you can swap this out with any standard lightbulb you want.One item of note, the power cord is only 3' long. So, you may need an extension cord. This was not worth deducting a star because I like this lamp a lot.I'm really pleased with this light thus far. It looks great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty Lamp - Assembly Required
reviews.reviewText: This is a really pretty lamp. The facets in the base add interest and it is well proportioned. It is a good table lamp for bedroom or living room. Assembly is required, but instructions are included and easy to follow.This lamp comes with a 3 way LED bulb. It doesn't function like an old fashioned 3 way bulb. As you turn it, it goes Hi, Off, Medium, Off, Dim, Off. It must be replaced with the same type of bulb to retain the 3 way feature.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just Get It
reviews.reviewText: For an inexpensive lamp, I am WOW-ed!! It looks better than the photos. Quick delivery, packed well, and very simple and quick to put together. This is for a guest bedroom and I already ordered an other one. This lamp is stable and is good height for a bedside table. I ways look for 3way switches and it has that too. I really like that it turns off between changes in brightness. If you use the same level of light most of the time, you don't have to run through the circuit. I am delighted. Please note (if the camera will pick it up) the way the light plays on the geometric pattern.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I would give this 10 stars were it possible. It is so pretty! The base is glazed ceramic and the pattern just looks so clean and nice. The shade is made well and goes together in a minute or two. I am really impressed at the quality for the low price. It is a great size and will enhance anywhere you choose to use it. I am using it on my office desk. Couldn’t be more pleased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great lamp. Comes with a dimmable bulb. Looks great. For the price point you can’t go wrong. Matches any style decor.
